name: Ronix- A 'Xonix' Clone Version
description:
This game was made using my custom engine. This is my first game posted on itch.io, so I'm hoping at least a few people play this. The game was somewhat similar to Xonix but I wasn't sure about the rules of the Xonix game. I watched many videos about the game but didn't understand how the player passed the level. I decided to add some rules to my own version.

Rules:
1. Do not let the enemy touch your path.
2. Do not touch your own path.
3. Fill more than 200 tiles on screen
4. You get a 1UP every 5th level. 
5. The game ends at level 15.

Resolution: 1280x720

Graphics: 1-bit
